item.description:
Let's do some team trivia!

Not so good with arcane facts? No problem.

Our competition is mostly just there for show. We destroyed them the last THREE times we played. Let's try for a fourth!

Join us for dinner/appetizers/drinks/whatever. We get to huddle as a team before turning in any answers, so there is *NO* pressure.

Gas Lamp Grille Features: Great Food, Exotic Beers, Music, sports on their several large-screen plasma televisions, and most importantly, yours truly!

Trivia starts around 10:00 and goes pretty quickly - it's done in under 90 minutes. We'll meet at 9:30 so we have time to chat and taunt the other teams with our patented triple Ts (Trivia Trash-Talking).
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Bar - Adam is 5'8" with short dark brown hair, cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: The Gas Lamp Grille - Monday Trivia
